title: Interpretation of a dream about the sea in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing the sea in a dream for a man, a single woman, a married woman, and a pregnant woman depends exactly on many factors, as well as the interpretation, since the interpretation of dreams is one of the discretionary matters that interpreters do, so the interpretation of a dream varies from one interpreter to another, but these interpretations can sometimes be affected And sometimes they are not affected, so they cannot depend on the sea in the dreamer's dream. It can vary from one fortuneteller to another, depending on his condition, and seeing the sea in a dream can indicate good things often and bad things at other times. You may also be interested in the following : Bathing in a dreamInterpretation of seeing the sea in a dream:Interpretation of seeing the sea in a dream for a man, a single woman, a married woman, and a pregnant womanYou may be interested: Pregnancy in a dreamSeeing the sea in a single man’s dream can lead to multiple interpretations, and among these interpretations is if a young man sees the sea in his dream This explains the approaching date of his wedding or engagement, and if the young man sees that. A dream about drowning in the sea and not being able to get out of it, and this explains that this man is suffering from many problems and difficulties in his life. A single person seeing the sea in a dream, and that sea was calm, this indicates that this person will achieve his dreams and that he will live a calm and stable life, and seeing the sea calm in The dream is evidence of blessings, food, nourishment, and a lot of goodness in work. Seeing an unmarried man in a dream that he is swimming in the sea, this is good news. It explains that this person has been cleansed of sins and has repented to God. Seeing the sea with fish in a dream for someone, this explains success in life and following an extensive diet. You may also be interested in: Penguin in a dream Interpretation of seeing the sea in a dream for a man, a single woman, a married woman, and a pregnant woman at Ibn Sirin: If an unmarried girl sees the sea in her dream, and this sea is in a state of calm and stability, this interprets that this girl will fulfill her dreams and achieve what she obtains in her practical life. Her condition is calm, which explains that she is a respectable girl who is loved by the people around her. If an unmarried woman sees the sea and the weather is stormy, this explains that this girl is going through many family problems and difficulties that affect her psychological state and put her in a bad situation. As the stormy sea in a woman’s dream explains She is single, she is facing problems with her friends and problems in her professional life. If an unmarried girl sees that she is floating in sea water in a state of happiness, this interprets that she will enjoy a stable life and may be engaged to a man of good character who loves her. You may also be interested in: Washing the dead. Interpretation of a vision The sea in a dream for a man, a single woman, and a married woman. If a pregnant woman sees that she is swimming in a calm sea with clear water, this interprets that she will give birth easily, and her child will be healthy. Worrying about childbirth. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is drinking sea water, this means that she will get a lot of nutrition after she gives birth and that her husband will get a lot of nutrition. title: Learn more about the interpretation of farm dreams and their interpretations

preview.html: Dreaming that you have a farm during your sleepInterpretation of a dream about a farm Scientists unanimously agree that most often it indicates goodness for the dreamer and predicts many sustenance and blessings, as well as profits and gains, and seeing a farm and green planting and everything that has a green color heralds goodness. Completely different. Seeing a farm in a dream. To get the correct interpretation, search on Google for an Egyptian website for interpreting dreams. A person seeing himself inside a farm or walking on a farm, this vision indicates that this person will suffer as a result of fatigue, toil, and toil in life, and he will get what He wants, and God bless him. , abundant goodness and abundant food in his life, and seeing a farm in a dream also shows the boy’s source of livelihood. If an unmarried young man dreams that he is buying a farm, then this dream is a sign that the dreamer will marry a divorced or widowed woman. As for the one who sees in his dream that he is offering his farm for sale, This dream indicates that the dreamer is overcome by greed and seeks the fleeting world and forgets the afterlife. Also, selling the farm indicates abandonment and divorce of the wife with the intention of marrying another woman who is not distinguished from the first wife in anything except less than her in chastity and beauty. Seeing an unmarried girl on the farm in her dream Good news for her that there is good news on the way for her and that her life will be happy and full of success - God willing. Interpretation of the dream of a large green farm. Interpretation of the dream of the large green farm, this vision indicates a year full of gifts for the dreamer, as it will be a year in which his dreams and aspirations come true - with permission. God - and he gains goodness, blessing and happiness in his life on a practical, material and emotional level as well. Interpretation of planting in a dream The dream interpretation of a farm and seeing crops in a dream indicates that the dreamer will make a lot of profits from his trade if the plants are green and beautiful. Seeing withered and dried plants in a dream is A bad vision and indicates anxiety and great loss that the dreamer will suffer in his business. If an unmarried girl dreams of plants, her vision indicates that she will gain happiness in her life - God willing - and that the time of her marriage to her partner is approaching. Planting in a married woman’s dream is evidence that she will have children. A new baby - God willing - and the sex of the baby should be female. Planting a beautiful tree in a dream is a sign that the husband is a good person. Seeing plants in a married woman’s dream means that she is living a calm, stable and happy married life. What is the interpretation of a dream about planting a tree? Seeing a tree in a dream is considered Praiseworthy visions that bring a lot of goodness to the dreamer, as long as the shape of the trees is green and beautiful. Planting trees in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will do something and achieve it – God willing. If he intends to get married, it will be a successful marriage. Seeing her watering trees in a dream, in the case of a married woman, indicates pregnancy - God willing. In the case of a person, this indicates that the dreamer is interested in a romantic relationship between him and another person. Seeing a tree whose leaves appear dry and withered is a sign of failure in life. If a man sees...

title: Interpretation of preaching in a dream for different occasions

preview.html: Interpretation of engaging in a dream We will discuss this in our next article. Perhaps one of the most common dreams that everyone has, especially girls, is an engagement. In fact, every person wishes to have a wonderful engagement that he can be happy with, so these wishes are reflected in their dreams, but there are different interpretations of the dream of engagement depending on the details of the vision and the dreamer’s condition, and through the following lines in the encyclopedia we will show you the most important scholars’ interpretations of seeing the engagement in a dream. Interpretation of preaching. In a dream for different occasions. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of engagement in a dream. Ibn Sirin says: If a person sees himself proposing to a married woman, then his vision indicates his inability to get what he asks for, and if the woman is a widow or divorced, this portends a financial crisis on his way. Whoever dreams that he is preparing for an engagement party, his vision shows that he is suffering from loneliness and anxiety, but if he sees that he is engaged to a beautiful girl, this is good news that he will achieve what he wants. It is a good vision for a girl to propose to a young man, because that means that the world is coming to him and leaning towards him to achieve what he seeks. And his ability to overcome the difficulties and challenges he faces. Seeing someone getting engaged to a bad girl indicates that he is making many mistakes. It is a warning to him and trying to get engaged to a girl, and it is an indication of his search for something important in the world. Interpretation of preaching in a dream by Ibn Shaheen, and from Ibn Shaheen’s point of view Shaheen: Seeing a married man engaged to an unknown girl is evidence of the imminent fulfillment of his desires in life and obtaining a new promotion at work. Whoever sees that he is engaged to a girl with bad morals, the dream indicates that he has committed sins and misdeeds, and if the engagement ceremony ends in disaster, it symbolizes the dreamer’s failure and inability. About achieving his goals and losing them. . From his money if he is a merchant, and whoever sees himself wanting to propose to a married woman, this means that he will not achieve an impossible goal. He is looking for him and the songs and music at the engagement party are unpleasant visions because they mean that the fortuneteller will suffer a great misfortune. Engagement in a dream for a single womanIf an unmarried woman dreams that someone has engaged her, and she is happy with this engagement, then this vision indicates that she will soon achieve her ambitions and dreams. Seeking security. Buying an engagement dress in a dream for an unmarried woman is a warning to her that she may soon be in danger, and if she wears an engagement ring in a big party, she will find a new job. Interpretation of a dream about a married woman’s engagementIf a married woman sees that she is engaged, this promises her a great expense, It could be a relative's pregnancy or a new job. Seeing a married woman’s engagement indicates family stability in her life and the mutual love between her and her husband, and it may indicate an imminent engagement to her daughter. Interpretation of a dream about a pregnant woman’s engagement: A pregnant woman’s engagement in a dream, or her presence at the engagement of one of her relatives or friends, is an indication of an impending trick, approaching... Her date of birth, which will be easily and conveniently, and confirmed by her. The safety of her fetus. Interpretation of a dream about engagement to a divorced woman: One of the most promising visions is the engagement of a divorced woman in a dream, because

title: Interpretation of dreams: My cousin loves me in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about my cousin loving me in a dream. If you want to know the interpretation of a dream about my cousin loving me in a dream, we will learn through the following interpretations of scholars and translators and not personal interpretations..Interpretation of dreams about my cousin loving me in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my cousin loving me in a dream can lead to Love for my cousin, and God knows all that is unseen. Likewise, if an unmarried girl sees that her cousin loves her, she may express her love for him, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees that her cousin loves her in a dream, this may be evidence of her admiration for him, and God knows best. I know. Also, seeing your cousin in a dream can mean that you think about him and love him, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about my neighbor in my house in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my neighbor in my house in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see that. The neighbor in your house may be a sign of your arrival to good news, by God. I know: If the dreamer sees his neighbor visiting him in his house to attend the wedding of one of his children, then this may be good news, and God knows the unseen. When you see a neighbor visiting and eating dinner at his house, this may lead to goodness that succeeds, and God knows all the unseen things. Interpretation of a dream that a son My uncle looks at me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my cousin looking at me in a dream can lead to goodness that will succeed, and God knows all that is not seen. If an unmarried girl sees her cousin looking at her, it may be a sign of happiness, God willing. Likewise, seeing my cousin looking at me in a dream It can represent marriage and God has all knowledge. If an unmarried girl sees her cousin looking at her and smiling in a dream, it may be a sign of happiness, God willing. Interpretation of dreams of my cousin talking to me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of my cousin talking to me in a dream can express goodness. And happiness, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees his cousin, he can resort to contentment, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If an unmarried girl sees her cousin talking to her in a dream, this may indicate her cousin’s support and assistance, and God knows the unseen. As she can express that her cousin supports and supports her. And God is Most High and Most Knowing. The interpretation of a dream about my cousin in our house in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about my cousin in our house in a dream can be a sign of kindness, and God knows the unseen. Seeing a cousin in a dream can represent happiness, God willing. If a married man sees his cousin in a dream, this may indicate a partnership with... His cousin, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When a single girl sees her cousin, she can turn to love, and God knows all that is unseen. And if a married woman sees her cousin, this may indicate happiness that she has eaten, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream that my cousin kisses me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about kissing my cousin In a dream, it could be a sign of sadness and anxiety, and God knows all that is not seen. Also, seeing my cousin kissing me in a dream could indicate a family dispute, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If an unmarried girl sees her cousin kissing her in a dream, this may indicate that she lacks emotional experience and that God knows the unseen. When you see

title: Interpretation of dreams about seeing olives in a dream by Ibn Sirin and the great commentators

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing olives in a dream: Seeing olives in a dream is one of the good visions that indicate blessings and nourishment. It should be noted that interpretive scholars have interpreted this vision and deduced many different interpretations, connotations and meanings. It should be noted that the interpretation of seeing H depends greatly on the condition of the viewer in the dream. And the situation in which the scene is seen, so the interpretation of seeing green or black olives varies according to the condition of the dreamer, and through our next article he will learn to interpret the dream of seeing olives in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of seeing olives in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted the dream of seeing olives in a dream. Through his interpretation, he concluded many different interpretations and meanings of seeing a dream about olives in a dream. Ibn Sirin’s dream: According to the interpretation of the scholar Ibn Sirin, seeing olives in a dream is one of the signs of goodness that the dreamer will encounter in the coming period, and it may indicate closeness to God, distance from sins, guidance, and piety. Ibn Sirin interprets seeing olives in a dream as a sign of abundance of kindness, abundance of food, and the acquisition of money. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is pressing olives, then this vision indicates that the dreamer will spend difficult days, during which his unhappiness and exhaustion will increase. But if the dreamer sees olives in a dream and buys olives, then this vision indicates the imminent return of the absent person. Ibn Sirin interpreted that the vision A large quantity of olives. The dreamer continues to find work or do his own work and his work succeeds. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing ants in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of dreams of seeing olive trees and their trees in a dream. In the context of the discussion about the interpretation of the dream of seeing olives in a dream and according to what was stated in Interpretation of seeing olives is a good dream that shows food and goodness in general. I will explain to you the interpretation of the dream of seeing olives in a dream and their trees in a dream as follows: If the dreamer sees olives in a dream, this vision indicates that he is a blessed and useful person who will benefit his relatives, and the olives show blessing and knowledge. As for seeing the planting of olive trees in a dream, this vision is an indication of the approaching date. Achieving ambitions and goals and the dreamer entering a new life full of goodness. Also, the interpretation of seeing him climbing olive trees may indicate that the dreamer will suffer from some problems in the coming period. If the priest sees in a dream that he is climbing an olive tree and the priest is not working in reality, then a relative will help him. As for seeing the olive tree being cut down, this vision means that the priest will face some problems and crises in the coming period. Interpretation of the dream in which you see picking olives in a dream. After we explained to you the interpretation of the dream of seeing olives in a dream according to Ibn Sirin, therefore, the interpretation of seeing olives depends to a large extent. On the condition of the viewer and the scene in which he saw the olive, and under it you will do. Learn to interpret the vision of picking and collecting olives as follows: If an unmarried girl sees herself in a dream picking olives from the tree, then

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing dawn in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see dawn in a dream according to Ibn Sirin, to see dawn in a dream is a sign of ending tension and sadness and freedom from problems, because it shows wealth after poverty, freedom from sadness, repentance, and return to God. It is one of the noble visions that show the happiness and beauty of the dreamer, and the dawn prayer in the mosque has a lot of goodness and blessing for those who perform it, and therefore we convey to you the most important interpretation of your dream. Seeing dawn in a dream. Follow us. A dream about seeing dawn by Ibn Sirini. The interpretation of dawn in a dream proves that a person has been liberated from problems and troubles in life. The interpretation of dawn in a dream for an already married man is different from his wife, which indicates their separation. Seeing dawn in a businessman’s dream proves that It will bring him generous profits and gains. Seeing the dawn prayer in his sleep is testimony to his achieving his goals and ambitions. A dream of seeing the dawn for a married woman: Seeing the dawn in a married woman’s dream symbolizes that she is living a stable life and a feeling of comfort. The interpretation of the dawn that a married woman sees in a dream can say that she will be Blessed and gentle in her life. The dawn of a married woman’s dream indicates the approaching date of her pregnancy. The dawn of a married woman’s dream indicates that she is living a happy married life. She dreams of seeing the dawn for a pregnant woman. Interpretation of the dream of dawn in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of the upcoming date of birth. In addition, seeing the dawn Dawn in a pregnant woman's dream also proves that she has a child, which will make her life happier. Dream of seeing dawn for a manSeeing dawn in a dream of a prisoner who dreams of dawn suggests a kind of comfort, pain and consolation. Explain that seeing dawn in a man's dream and praying for dawn in unfinished cases , means that half of his debt will be paid soon. The man saw in a dream the dawn and the Holy Cup, which indicates the disappearance of his sadness and anxiety. The dream of seeing the dawn prayer. The interpretation of the dream of seeing the dawn in a dream is a sign of the beginning of a new life. Seeing the dawn and the end of the prayer relieves him of anxiety and sadness. The prayer showed The immoral person in the church provides rich living and wealth in his life. A young man’s dawn prayer proves that he will marry a good girl. Seeing dawn and falling in a married woman’s dream indicates her readiness to satisfy her desires in life. A pregnant woman’s dream of seeing dawn is evidence of the ease of her birth. Seeing dawn in a dream is evidence of The Prophet’s journey on the path of guidance and justice. Surat Al-Fajr is evidence of a person’s distress in his dream, and God helps him. Dreaming of seeing dawn in a dream. And whoever sees that he is praying dawn, this indicates an improvement in his psychological and financial condition. The vision also indicates uprightness in obedience and repentance from sins. Seeing the dawn prayer in The dream of an unmarried girl indicates the approach of her marriage and also indicates success in her professional life. Seeing her praying towards the Qiblah indicates the many sins of the Prophet. If a divorced woman sees that she is praying Fajr, this indicates the collapse of worry and sadness, and that she has gone through difficult stages in her life. Seeing ablution For the dawn prayer indicates positive changes for the dreamer and a shift in his life for the better. Seeing him praying with the dead shows the bond of friendship that brought him together.

title: Interpretation of seeing the number 68 in a dream

preview.html: If the dreamer is in debt and is living a time full of worries, then this indicates that they are approaching and soon relief, God willing. Interpretation of seeing the number 68 in a dream for a single girl. If an unmarried woman sees in a dream that she is writing the number 68 in the dream and she is happy. It indicates her success in life and preservation. On her superiority over a long period of this success. Or seeing a single woman in a dream number 68 indicates the meaning of a happy life. Where an unmarried woman lives her entire life, God willing. The interpretation of seeing the number 68 in the dream of an unmarried and engaged girl varies. Here it indicates the nearness of Her marriage, God willing. And for her to do the things she dreamed of in her life. The number 68 in the dream clearly indicates an unmarried girl. If the number depicts something important that the dreamer must do in his life during this period. The number 68 in the dream also indicates the life that she lives. For a single woman, if it is written or designed well. It indicates a good life, and if it is in bad shape, it indicates a bad life. And if an unmarried woman tries to write the number 68 in a dream but is unable. It indicates the fears that the dreamer is experiencing in Her life. See also: Interpretation of seeing the number 8 in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the number 68 in a dream for a married woman. A married woman who dreams of the number 68 written inside her house and its shape is very distinctive. It explains something great and important that will happen to her in married life, God willing. And if a married woman sees that she is trying to She writes the number 68 in the dream, and it was beautiful. Here it indicates the most beautiful things that she will see in her life, God willing. The number 68 in the dream indicates the good things that the married woman who dreams will experience in her life, God willing. It also explains that the number 68 in a dream is for a woman Married if written incorrectly. It indicates that major differences will appear in the life of this dreaming woman. And if the number 68 in the dream is not a good shape, and it is bad and very small in the dream. It indicates the many problems that this married woman will face in her life. Interpretation of the vision The number 68 in a dream for a divorced woman. If a divorced woman sees in a dream that she was writing the number 68 in a dream and felt happy. The meaning indicates her great success in life, God willing. Or if a divorced woman sees in a dream that she is writing the number 68 in a large and large place in the dream. It is an indication of good things. Which a divorced woman will experience in her life. Likewise, seeing a divorced woman with the number 68 in a dream while her husband gives it to her in the dream. Here the meaning differs in the presence of new things that will happen between this divorced woman and her ex-husband. Either seeing a divorced woman with the number 68 in a dream indicates happy dreams. And the happiness that this divorced woman will experience God willing. And seeing that the divorced person has drawn well the number 68 in a dream. It indicates the presence of great joy or a close marriage for this divorced woman. And you will be very happy for him, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Read also: Interpretation of dreams of numbers in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation Seeing the number 68 in a dream about a man and its meaning is vision

title: Interpretation of a dream about searching for a former lover who is single and married according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about searching for an ex-lover. If a girl sees her ex-lover in a dream, this vision causes anxiety and confusion in girls, especially single women, which makes boys search for and interpret this dream. The vision differs according to the condition of each girl, what are the circumstances in which she lives, which we will present in this article. We will explain to you the interpretive consequences of the dream of searching for a former lover in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of searching for a former lover in a dreamIt is known that dreaming of a former lover is only due to constant thinking In the topic and because of the person's subconscious conversation, so we will explain in the following points the interpretation implications of the dream of searching for an ex-lover. - love. In a dream: Some scholars believe that a person’s dream of an ex-lover means that the dreamer is looking for solutions to his problems in his current life. If a woman sees in her dream that she is searching for her ex-lover and does not find him, this indicates her intense fear of not getting the person she wants to be in a relationship with. .Seeing a girl’s ex-boyfriend in her dream means that she has not seen a family member, a close person, or a friend for a long time. And if a girl sees her ex-boyfriend in her dream, this is a sign that shows some secrets that the girl may have in her life. These secrets are hidden and she cannot talk to her family members, but in the end her secrets will be revealed. If a girl sees in her dream that she names her ex-lover with the name Muhammad, this is a sign that the lover will return to her and achieve her dreams and goals. This vision shows the desire for love and emotions and that the dreamer He lacks love and security. See also: Interpretation of a dream about forced marriage and the crying of single and divorced women and men by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about searching for a former lover in a single woman’s dream. Many dreams occur in a single girl’s dream, and this comes from her thinking a lot about life, and it is possible that these dreams will appear. The vision indicates the intensity of her love for this person, and in the following points we will explain its interpretation. Dream about searching for a former lover in a single woman’s dream: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is searching for a former lover, this indicates that she feels sad about the absence of this person. It is possible that this vision is an indication of the great loss that this girl will suffer. But if A single girl saw in a dream that she saw someone she loved, but he disappeared in the dream, then this indicates that the girl will face many problems in her life and that her psychology is bad. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is looking for someone near her, and he was near her and she did not find him, This means that she will lose her job in the coming period. If a single woman dreams that she is looking for someone she loves and does not find him in the dream, this indicates the intensity of her love for this person. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a dolphin in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. Interpretation of a dream about searching for a former lover in A dream for a married woman: There are different interpretations of seeing a dream of a former lover in a dream for a married woman, and we will present these interpretations in the following points: If a woman sees

title: Interpretation of kissing the deceased in a dream: I saw the deceased kissing me in a dream

preview.html: Contents: Dreaming of embracing the deceased's cheek, crying and hugging in a dream of an unmarried, married and pregnant girl Kissing the head of the deceased Kissing the hand of the deceased Imam al-Sadiq, peace be upon him. Interpretation of kissing the dead in a dream If you see yourself kissing the dead and you are ready and loving, this will bring you good, both professionally and emotionally. If you see that the dead is the one kissing you, this indicates that he will accept you from his goodness, especially from his money or work. If you kiss a dead person you do not know or know you, this means that you will suddenly get money that you did not know before. When you embrace the dead, this indicates your longevity and that you will get out of any distress if you suffer from it. If you kiss the hand of the dead, this indicates your humility or greater harmony with others. If you see yourself kissing a naked dead person, this indicates that you will miss many good things and the person who sees in his dream that one of the dead talked to him about some things about himself or that he belongs to one of the people, what this dead person says in the dream is true and confirmed most of the time and these things are real and actually exist Because seeing the dead is a true vision. Whoever sees in his dream that someone he knows has died or died in reality, and that person was smiling and seemed to have clear signs of happiness, then the dream indicates the good condition of that deceased person with his Lord and that he is happy with his position, God willing. Whoever sees in his dream that he is walking behind one of the people who died in reality, his vision indicates that this person will follow the same wrong steps that this dead person followed in his life. Interpretation of the dead kissing the living person in a dream - YouTube
